p: where D is the diffusion coefficient of lithium ions in pure electrolyte, D eff is the effective diffusion coefficient 3 6, ρ is the porosity, and τ is the tortuosity 15 38. In contrast to DVC, which operates directly on the raw data, quantification of microstructural parameters, such as porosity or tortuosity, requires data binarization. Additionally, for a dynamically evolving microstructure, determination of microstructural parameters requires the analysis of sub-volumes containing the same particles and pores for each time step.
